title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When calling ajc with the parameters sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar, an output file is created with a .jar extension. However, this file is not a valid jar file because it does not contain a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file. The documentation for ajc suggests that the outjar parameter should put the output classes in a zip file, but it does not seem to be functioning correctly in this case.
OB: The output file created by ajc with the outjar parameter does not contain a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The outjar parameter should create a valid jar file that includes a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file.
SR: ajc should create a valid jar file with a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file when using the outjar parameter.
